job_description: Senior Data Engineering Advisor In this ‘era of data’, our ability to leverage high quality insights and deliver personalized experiences to our customers is dependent on strong customer data management and data governance.  A critical outcome of a “best in class” customer data management organization is to enable the right customer data, in the most effective and efficient manner, for the many business processes that ultimately serve our customers in their many touchpoints and interactions with Dell every day. Join us as a Senior Data Engineering Advisor on our Customer Data Technology Enablement team in Brazil or Panama or other remote Egypt locations to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Data Engineer, you will create solutions that helps data scientists and analysts, not only analyze data but also lead delivery of production grade solutions depending on the outcomes of analyses. You will analyze infrastructure, business goals, and general business environment to design technical systems. You will: Drive design and implementation of ETL solutions Interact with product managers, data scientists and developers in order to envision, model and provide initial models and designs that can be built. Take end-to-end responsibility for designing, building, maintaining batch and real-time data pipelines and solutions Implement APIs Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Familiar with deployment models of Elastic search, Kubernetes, Kafka or Rabbit MQ Experience in creating, implementing, integrating and testing APIs Implemented production grade solution to handle high volume, high velocity data traffic Developed and deployed complex ETL pipelines and back-end systems Docker, Kubernetes, RESTful APIs, Python, Bash, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ Desirable Requirements Prior experience working on customer experience initiatives, and improving the overall customer experience Bachelor's degree required Experience with Graph DB. Advanced English Here’s our story; now tell us yours Dell Technologies helps organizations build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress. What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more. We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today. You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.
